executable.name: fgcz_scaffold.bash
executable.description: This is the 2015 generic scaffold application interface between B-Fabric and ScaffoldBatch4. see also: https://github.com/cpanse/bfabric-app/tree/fgcz/apps/scaffold and http://fgcz-intranet.uzh.ch/tiki-index.php?page=scaffold.

parameter.description: inidcates if x!tandem should be used for PSM confirmation.
parameter.label: use x!tandem

parameter.description: MudPIT (Multidimensional Protein Identification Technology) combines multiple mascot result files into a single protein list. If not selected, each input resource (mascot result file) is treated as an individual BiologicalSample.
parameter.label: use MudPIT

parameter.description: Using the GeLC-MS option all input resource are handled as a single BiologicalSample. This option is usually used when the mudpit option is not selected.
parameter.label: use GeLC-MS configuration

parameter.description: This command is specific to Scaffold Q+. These commands specify the quantitative model type, name, and purity correction for the labels. Possible values are: 'iTRAQ 4-Plex' and 'iTRAQ 8-Plex
parameter.label: QuantitativeModel
